2143.subject: ENVS
2143.descrlong: This problem-based learning course consists of a series of independent projects that focus on the interaction between energy, sustainability, and the environment.   Each project is designed as a hands-on, collaborative inquiry where students are presented with a challenge and key question.   Each semester-long course consists of 3 to 6 of these projects.  One project each semester is focused exclusively on solving a major challenge in the campus climate action plan.
